attributes.action: Give Phil Dobson some of the billions wasted on non-working NHS computer systems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My kids could have told you the projects were too complicated to work, it is absolutely disgusting that the people that spent all that time and money on the waste-of-time scheme, are still in their jobs. Their waste of scarce NHS resources, now consigns people going blind or dying of cancer to an early grave, where they could otherwise have been saved by paying for the medicine that "NICE" now say they cannot have.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
